localised_text.tooltip_text: This runs a short demo level to help identify what graphics settings you should run the game on.

icon_extreme_warning.componentleveltooltip: Extreme shadow detail may adversely affect performance.

icon_ui_scale_warning.componentleveltooltip: Increasing the UI scale higher than the default can lead to display issues with text, tooltips and panels.

label_tx.componentleveltooltip: Adjust the scale of all onscreen UI elements.||Scaling above 100% is permitted at 2560x1440 resolution and above.
Adjust the scale of blood particle effects.
Adjust the resolution for 3D rendering while maintaining the 2D UI scale.
Adjust the scale of blood stains on units.

label_txt.componentleveltooltip: Use as much video memory as your system has available. This will improve quality but can reduce performance.
Display your device's battery meter.
The level of detail used by shadows in battle and campaign.
Toggle the models used in Advisor and Character panels.
Enable blood and gore effects.
The level of detail used by terrain in battle.
Adds extra detail for shadows close to the root of the shadow.
Enables cloth simulation on certain characters in battle.
Enable blood and gore effects.
The filtering method used by textures in battle and campaign.
Simulate ambient lighting and shadows around the edges of objects.
Enable a lighting effect where light at the edge of the camera is reduced to give a vignette effect.
Limit frame rate to your monitor's refresh rate. This will reduce screen tearing, but may reduce frame rate.
Fade units in battle when the camera gets close to them, avoiding any clipping.
Scale the number of entities in each unit in battle.
Blood on camera tooltip
Control the distance at which grass is rendered in battle.
Control the distance at which trees are rendered in battle.
Simulates ambient lighting and shadows around the edges of objects.
Control the appearance of polygon edges in battle and campaign.
Low fog disables volumetric lighting. Requires shadows to be enabled.
The duration that dead bodies remain on the map for.
The level of detail used by visual effects in battle and campaign, such as smoke and explosions.
The level of detail used by unit models in battle and campaign.
The level of detail used by the sky in battle and campaign||Ultra-quality uses a hardware rendered sky with dynamic clouds.
Control the amount of blur distant objects receive beyond the focus point of the camera.
Apply reflections to reflective surfaces such as metal and water.
Enable a post-process sharpening effect.
Enable dismembering of body parts.
The level of detail used by lighting in battle and campaign.
The level of detail used by building models in battle.
The level of detail used by textures in battle and campaign.

template_icon_downgraded.componentleveltooltip: Due to memory constraints, this setting has been downgraded to: %S.||To adjust this setting, check the box for 'Unlimited video memory'.

component_text.text: Do you want to keep the new screen resolution?
